scripts.test:help:
echo "
To run tests, you need to set the VENICE_API_KEY environment variable:

  # On Linux/macOS:
  export VENICE_API_KEY=your-api-key

  # On Windows Command Prompt:
  set VENICE_API_KEY=your-api-key

  # On Windows PowerShell:
  $env:VENICE_API_KEY="your-api-key"

Then run one of the test scripts:
  pnpm run test:api
  pnpm run test:sdk
  pnpm run test:sdk:2
  pnpm run test:sdk:3
"
